frontmatter.title: (Tableau) Fantasy Football Players and Position Trends

node.html: Using Tableau, I visualized the weekly fantasy football performance of players and positions.

frontmatter.title: (Tableau) Passing EPA as a Zero-Sum Game

node.html: In this Tableau viz, I allow users to represent NFL offensive routes vs defensive coverages as a matrix representing a zero-sum game using EPA as the payoff.

Using an XGBoost model, I predict offensive EPA using situational football as features. I allowed users to adjust the situation using this Streamlit app, as well as show which defensive coverage would minimize EPA.

frontmatter.title: (Article) How Much Do Top Receivers Contribute to a Quarterback's Stats?

node.html: In this article I explore the statistical relationship between notable NFL quarterbacks and his top target to see if a quarterback is overly dependant on his elite receiving option.
